meanings.definition: Not taking part in an activity or process.
meanings.sent1: The nonparticipatory student preferred to watch rather than join the game.
meanings.sent2: She felt left out at the party because of her nonparticipatory nature.
meanings.sent3: The nonparticipatory squirrel just observed as the others gathered nuts.
meanings.sent4: The nonparticipatory clouds hung motionless in the sky, unaffected by the wind.
meanings.sent5: His nonparticipatory attitude made it hard for him to make friends.

meanings.definition: Not actively involved in a situation or event.
meanings.sent1: The nonparticipatory audience sat quietly throughout the entire performance.
meanings.sent2: He remained nonparticipatory during the heated discussion, choosing not to voice his opinion.
meanings.sent3: The nonparticipatory cat lounged lazily on the windowsill, uninterested in the commotion outside.
meanings.sent4: The nonparticipatory clock seemed to tick slowly, as if disinterested in keeping time.
meanings.sent5: Her nonparticipatory behavior at work led to misunderstandings with her colleagues.
